itemListElement.name: Mango Curry Tempeh. Restaurant curries in your kitchen. vegan glutenfree recipe

@graph.name: Mango Curry Tempeh. Restaurant Curries In Your Kitchen. Vegan Gluten Free Recipe
@graph.description: Mango Curry Tempeh. Restaurant Curries In Your Kitchen. A delicious, easy and flavor packed curry made with tempeh and spices. Vegan and Gluten Free Recipe. #glutenfree #veganricha #vegan
recipeIngredient: 4 oz tempeh cubed ((3/4 cup, steam in boiling water for 8-10 mins, drain and use))
2 teaspoons organic canola oil or any cooking oil
1/3 cup cashews soaked for an hour ((less or more for creaminess))

recipeInstructions.text: In a large pan, add oil and heat at medium heat.
recipeInstructions.name: In a large pan, add oil and heat at medium heat.

recipeInstructions.text: Add in the serrano chili peppers, fennel seeds and onion and cook on medium low heat for 8-10 minutes stirring occasionally, till the onions are golden.
recipeInstructions.name: Add in the serrano chili peppers, fennel seeds and onion and cook on medium low heat for 8-10 minutes stirring occasionally, till the onions are golden.

recipeInstructions.text: Cool the onions a little and blend with the cashews, garam masala, mango chutney and 3/4 cup water into a creamy puree.
recipeInstructions.name: Cool the onions a little and blend with the cashews, garam masala, mango chutney and 3/4 cup water into a creamy puree.

recipeInstructions.text: In the same pan, add in this puree, salt and cubed tempeh and mix well.
recipeInstructions.name: In the same pan, add in this puree, salt and cubed tempeh and mix well.

recipeInstructions.text: Cook on low heat, covered, for 25-30 minutes or until the curry thickens and the tempeh almost doubles in size.
recipeInstructions.name: Cook on low heat, covered, for 25-30 minutes or until the curry thickens and the tempeh almost doubles in size.

recipeInstructions.text: Adjust for salt and spice. Add some water if the curry is too thick. Bring to a boil(3-4 minutes)
recipeInstructions.name: Adjust for salt and spice. Add some water if the curry is too thick. Bring to a boil(3-4 minutes)

recipeInstructions.text: Serve hot topped with fresh cilantro and mint, with Indian flat breads like Roti or Naan or with cumin scented Basmati rice or Quinoa.
recipeInstructions.name: Serve hot topped with fresh cilantro and mint, with Indian flat breads like Roti or Naan or with cumin scented Basmati rice or Quinoa.

recipeInstructions.text: You can add some thickly sliced bell peppers and onions, or cauliflower to the curry along with tempeh as well.
recipeInstructions.name: You can add some thickly sliced bell peppers and onions, or cauliflower to the curry along with tempeh as well.

@graph.keywords: fruit curry, gluten free curry, vegan curry recipe
